title: Open Channel Management - RegulationStructure
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic Regulation Structure made for Raw-Water (Open Channels) System Management domain. Regulation structure represents a junction-type object, controlling the water flow in the raw-water system.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be RegulationStructure

numberOfGates.description: Property. An integer value defining the number of control gates attached to the regulation structure.

numberOfSpillways.description: Property. An integer value defining the number of spillways attached to the regulation structure.

teleCommand.description: Property. Define whether the regulation structure is controlled remotely or manually. True/False value.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

hasSluiceGate.description: Relationship. Reference to an entity of type Sluice gate.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

hasSpillway.description: Relationship. Reference to an entity of type Sluice gate Spillway.

position.description: Property. Object providing information about the distance with the rest of the elements and a relationship with them.

distance.description: Property. The distance between this Entity and a reference point (e.g., the most upstream point of the system).

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity.
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity.

refPoint.description: Relationship. The reference point distance is measured from.
